original: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: noāsavam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā noāsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo
analyzed: na no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā no āsavam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ ca na no āsavaḥ

original: Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na noāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavañca
analyzed: noāsavañca na noāsavañca dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā noāsavañca

original: nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca
analyzed: na no āsavañca dhammam paṭicca na no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā no āsavañca na no āsavañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ ca na noāsavaḥ ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
